QuestData.Title: To Kill a Loa
QuestData.Description:
I am badly hurt... I don't think I can move. Don't worry, I have some potions dat can heal me... slowly.
Hir'eek is just down de cavern dere. De poison injured him, but he is a loa, and it will take more than dat to take him down.
I can't believe we... YOU are going kill a loa. It's just not someting we do... but Hir'eek serves G'huun. We have no choice!
It's all up to you, now. Kill Hir'eek and end dis madness!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The blood trolls of Nazmir worship Hir'eek after he succumbed to the corruption of G'huun.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Hir'eek, the loa of bats.
